com.bmc.arsys.apitransport

Interface ApiConfigI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ApiPropertyI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApiConfig, Config

    public interface ApiConfigI
extends ApiPropertyI
    This is the config interface that config class required for an api program.
